mods.name: n76-ultrapack

mods.description:
Add and replaces characters images, now every static (not procedural) character in the game has its own avatar. Also some errors have been fixed in this package, thx to Failas. Preview without spoilers, I'll add link to the preview with names and descriptions later.
Installation: Download mod -> Launch with mods -> Options -> Check if n76 above Rahi in the Imagepack section (if not move it up by the arrow) -> Play

mods.name: Nova Sub Training
mods.author: JakeJames
mods.description:
Warning: Heavy focus on impregnation fetish.
Mod to train Nova to be more submissive during modified scenes.

Adds a new flag called 'NovaSub' which affects modified scenes. Modified scenes can increase or decrease this flag. There are four stages of submissiveness currently with breakpoints at 0, 37, 67, and 91.

Modified Scenes:
- FuckSubbyNovaScene.gd
-- Uses all four stages of submissiveness
--- Slight variations while Nova is already pregnant
- NovaPetPlayScene.gd
-- Replaces the original prompt when at >=67 submissiveness
--- Slight variations at >= 91
--- Includes a special guest appearance..

mods.name: RNGPerks
mods.author: CanInBad
mods.description:
This mod adds 2 perks
1) Dramaturgy (tier 2, cost 4 points, in Combat)
 - Randomly roll effect for either good buff, near down experience, and a item from custom list in a battle, is inside specials
2) Gambler Cum Stud (tier 3, cost 3 points, in Breeder)
 - Get your balls fill up to the brim after you cum with 30% chance

and a Dramaturgy's exclusive item:
**- Flashlight**
   - A weapon use in combat to instantly blind any foe (totally did not check if the opponent have a blindfold or not), is inside specials
   - only have 2 charges

changelog:
   * fixed crashing for new version (0.1.1)
   * fixed chance being 100% (how did i missed this??????)
   * hopfully has mod info in the json named the same as zip

mods.name: Hypnosis Kink
mods.author: PeteTimesSix
mods.description:
Engage with exciting hypnotic arts! You can meet the prison's only licensed hypnotherapist in the Lilac cellblock, or if you prefer more forceful methods, it seems someone's left a package unattended in the engineering workshop. Or maybe the next guard you meet decides to go high-tech when tying you up. Regardless of which route you choose, engaging with hypnosis will grant you hypnosis skill XP, though there might be some drawbacks to learning how to make your mind malleable...
[url=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Alexofp/BDCCMods/main/previews/hypno1.png]Preview 1[/url] [url=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Alexofp/BDCCMods/main/previews/hypno2.png]Preview 2[/url]

mods.name: Hypertus
mods.author: CanInBad
mods.description:
[b]WARNING: This contains hyper stuff, if you dislike it then leave[/b]
This mod adds bodyparts that are infused with "Bluespace anomalies" that enhance them enough to become unstable size wise

Those said bodyparts can be enhanced with perks

This mod has 37 perks in a unique skill tree "Hyper"
said skill tree have 5 tiers unlocks at 0, 5, 15, 30, 50

Some perks might be hidden due to incompatible bodyparts 

There is no story in this version yet, but the perks and bodyparts might not break in the future

Has compatibility layer between these mods:
 - Synth Species
 - Knotted Horse Cock
 - Fluffy Bodyparts
 - Avali Species (both version)

if you have any feedback send it in #mods-discussion and ping me
or open an issue on [url=https://github.com/CanInBad/HypertusMod]https://github.com/CanInBad/HypertusMod[/url] 

"Mobile version" available on discord
